review: Replaced my Apple TV with combination of the PLEX media server app. So much better than iTunes and (broken) Home Share.Only gripes:Must be connected to same WiFi as iPhone to control remotely without remote.Otherwise requires remote at all times; easy to forget when traveling.Can't change WiFi without remote; need same WiFi settings set to operate. Catch-22.Doesn't work with universal remotes that work on IR; annoying having to keep an extra remote handy.Supports BlueTooth but can't autosync with phones, mice, keyboards unless you have the remote with you.
